body.name: Perlegear UL Listed Full Motion TV Mount for Most 26–60 inch Flat or Curved TVs up to 82 lbs, Wall Bracket with Articulating Arms, Tool-Free Tilt, Swivel, Extension, Max VESA 400x400mm, PGMF3

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbon Neutral by Carbon Trust products reduce their carbon footprint year after year and any outstanding emissions are offset.

features: Sturdy Construction: Featuring premium heavy-duty steel and reinforced structure, the Perlegear TV wall mount is UL certified for its performance, durability, and safety, and supports up to 82 lbs. Larger TV plate and solid wall plate provide more peace of mind compared with other mounts.

Comfortable Viewing Experience: This 55 inch TV wall mount can help to minimize glare thanks to +5°/–15° tool-free tilt. Redirect the screen toward your position with +/–90° swivel and level your TV +/–3° after installation to fine tune your TV's position.

Easy 3-Step Installation: Detailed instructions and mounting hardware are included with the Perlegear single stud TV mount for hassle-free installation. Simply attach the TV brackets, mount the wall plate, then hang your TV.

Space-Saving Design: The Perlegear corner TV mount extends up to 17.3″ to bring your TV closer and retracts back to 3″ from the wall for a low-profile look. The single stud design fits awkward spaces like corners to maximize your living space.

Wide Compatibility: This swivel TV mount is an ideal choice for most 26″ to 60″ flat and curved TVs with VESA patterns 100x100 to 400x400mm. Please verify the size, weight, and VESA pattern of your TV before purchase. Compatible with wood studs, concrete, and brick wall mounting.

reviews.reviewerName: This is not a ginger ale!
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars this product is a perfect choice
reviews.reviewText: If you're in search of a reliable and user-friendly TV mount for your flat or curved TV, this product is a perfect choice.The first thing that impressed me about this TV mount is its build quality and sturdiness. The mount is made from high-quality materials that provide a robust and secure support for my TV. It is designed to hold TVs weighing up to 82 lbs, ensuring stability and peace of mind. The construction feels solid and durable, giving me confidence that my TV is safely mounted on the wall.The full motion capability of this TV mount is a standout feature. It allows for effortless tilting, swiveling, and extending, providing optimal viewing angles from various positions in the room. Whether you're sitting directly in front of the TV, watching from an adjacent area, or adjusting the viewing angle to reduce glare, this mount offers flexibility and convenience. The smooth and fluid motion ensures easy adjustments without any jerking or resistance.The compatibility of this TV mount is impressive. It is designed to fit most 26-60 inch flat or curved TVs, making it suitable for a wide range of TV models. The VESA pattern compatibility ensures that the mount will fit your TV securely and align properly with the mounting holes. However, it's always advisable to double-check the VESA pattern and weight capacity of your TV before purchasing.The tool-free tilt feature of this TV mount is a significant advantage. It allows for easy and hassle-free tilting adjustment without the need for additional tools. This feature is particularly useful when you want to optimize the viewing angle or make quick adjustments without any inconvenience.Installation of the Perlegear Full Motion TV Mount is straightforward and user-friendly. The package includes all the necessary hardware and clear step-by-step instructions, ensuring a smooth and efficient installation process. The mount is designed for easy installation on wood studs or concrete walls, providing versatility for different wall types.The cable management system of this TV mount is well thought out. It allows for neat and organized cable routing, preventing messy and tangled cables behind the TV. This not only improves the aesthetics of your entertainment area but also facilitates easy access to the cables when needed.In conclusion, the Perlegear Full Motion TV Mount is an outstanding wall mount that offers versatility, durability, and ease of installation. With its sturdy construction, full motion capability, compatibility with various TV sizes, tool-free tilt feature, and efficient cable management system, it provides everything you need to mount and enjoy your flat or curved TV with convenience and peace of mind. Whether you're setting up a home theater or upgrading your living room, this TV mount will enhance your viewing experience and provide a sleek and organized setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 32" tv and it's great! Easy and universal comes with everything to install!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great wall mount.
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install, great quality. For the price, it turned out better than I hope for, I would recommend this to anyone looking for a wall mount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was for a 47" LG TV set. I struggled with mounting the bracket in the back of the TV. Instructions were far from good and I finally realized I needed to use the biggest spacers to make it work. Once that was done, installing the mount to the wall was very easy. I liked the 3 screws in line so they go in the middle of the stud. It even came with a level gizmo so you can be sure your TV doesn't get mounted weird. The hardware is top quality and the mount is very sturdy with zero play. A limited amount of adjustment as far as tilting, up or down, and pulling off the wall but overall, a very good value for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This tv mount was easy to install. With the three screws properly mounted to a 2x4 it seems to have plenty holding power.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Wall mount
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install, works great with my 55 inch tv. I luv that it pivots. The price is unbeatable. I recommend this wall mount

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great, but takes time to install
reviews.reviewText: This mount works great, but you need a few tools that doesn’t come with it, such as a stud finder, a certain drill bit depending on type of mounting and a tape measure. It is sturdy and really impressed with it for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install and hang the TV.
